*Blizzard bends down* Blizzard: Do you have all of Sinister? *Blizzard says=
 to Sinesis*
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@=
egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, July 14, 2000 4:04 AM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast=
 Wars


  "Fine, but don't be surprised if I kill you!" Sinesis said to Bli=
zzard, coughing a few times.

  "Ah, never mind that last sentence, I need =
help, too." Sinesis said...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: ilo=
vealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Thursday, July 13, 2000=
 12:36 AM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    *Blizzard stopped reaching =
for Sinister's pieces when she saw Sinesis picking his parts up* Blizzard: =
Please let me help... *Blizzard says to Sinesis*
      ----- Original Messa=
ge ----- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Th=
ursday, July 13, 2000 12:14 AM
      Subject: Neo Beast Wars


      Deemos=
 helps Inzola back to their ship and he starts to repair her, but to no ava=
il. Deemos, very hurt himself, went to the Predacon base.

      "My wife, =
you see she in hurt, and I need to use your CR Chambers, I have been told t=
hat this is the base of the mighty Hell Beast, how can I help you, Hell Bea=
st? Just heal Inzola and myself!" Deemos called out to Anyone in Hell Beast=
's base.

      Sinesis slowly crawled along, pushing Sinister's parts. Sin=
esis stopped every mile to catch his breath, his jets her wrecked. He kept =
going and going and going.

      Plintissa seen a letter from Dracona, say=
ing she had retruned to base. Plintissa shrugged and walked along her way. =
Artist tripped her up and walked on ahead. Plintissa felt like crying again=
, this is the one she loved? Artist laughed and went on his way.

      Dra=
cona picked up the device, but suddenly, the device exploded, sending a fir=
eball into the Predacon base. (Megatron's base) Dracona gasped. She had bet=
ter be going now. She slowly started to sneak away.

      The Radicons hur=
ried on their way, maybe some other team would apreciate their skills, like=
 the Alliance. Airbomber just hoped that Infectra would come with them.

  =
    Lightmare's spark joined the Matrix, she is DEAD.

      Gangon's spark=
 hovered in front of BrightBlade, swirling around her over and over again.
=
